relatedBlades.title: DDoS Protection Services
relatedBlades.subtitle: Highly rated web, application & network DDoS protection
relatedBlades.copy:
- Cloudflare is named a Customers' Choice in the 2023 Gartner Peer Insights "Voice of the Customer": DDoS Mitigation Solutions.
- A LEADER in the 2021 Forrester Wave DDoS Mitigation Solutions<sup>1</sup>
- Cloudflare has received the most "High" ratings when compared to 6 other DDoS vendors across 23 criteria in Gartner's 2020 "Solution Comparison for DDoS Cloud Scrubbing Centers"
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Need more than just DDoS protection? Talk to an Expert!](#ent-demo-form "DDoS Enterprise Demo")
relatedBlades.leftLinkLoggedIn: [Need more than just DDoS protection? Talk to an Expert!](#ent-demo-form "DDoS Enterprise Demo")

features.title: %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion daily threats stopped
features.description: Cloudflare's %{NetworkCapacityV2} network blocks %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion daily threats on average. Our global network spans over %{DataCenterCount} cities & %{CountryCount} countries to stop attacks on the frontlines.

features.title: Easy setup
features.description: Easily onboard in minutes from the dashboard or our API. Adding Cloudflare security, performance, and reliability functionality is as easy as flipping a switch.

features.title: 24/7 email & phone support
features.description: Award winning, global, 24/7/365 email & emergency phone support (Enterprise plans). Plus on-demand resources, guides & best practice implementation.

relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare offers three DDoS protection solutions designed to protect anything connected to the Internet:
relatedBlades.title: What are you protecting?
relatedBlades.subtitle: DDoS Mitigation Options

relatedBlades.copy:
- __Website DDoS Protection -__  Web Services (L7): unmetered and free in all Cloudflare website application service plans.
- __Application DDoS Protection -__ Spectrum (L4): reverse proxy, pay-as-you-go service for all TCP/UDP applications (gaming, VOIP, etc.).
- __Network DDoS Protection -__ Magic Transit (L3): for on-premise, cloud, & hybrid networks. Combine DDoS protection, traffic acceleration, & more.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare ddos protection  osi layers outline

plansList.description: Website DDoS protection is Free in all application services plans, plus much more!

ctaButton.elementName: DDoS Web - Sign Up CTA Button

features.title: Included Free in all Application Service plans, plus Free CDN & Free SSL
Easy set up from the Cloudflare dashboard or API
Optional upgrades: Firewall (WAF), site acceleration, advanced bot mitigation & more

plansList.description: Protect your TCP/UDP applications against DDoS attacks with our pay-as-you-go service.

features.title: Proxy any TCP/UDP traffic through Cloudflare Spectrum
Easy set up from the Cloudflare dashboard or API
Load balance L4 traffic across multiple servers

plansList.description: Protect your network, data centers and infrastructure against DDoS attacks.

features.title: Mitigate most attacks in under 3 seconds
Integrate via BGP routing and GRE encapsulation
Native integration with L7 services (CDN, WAF, Bot Management, etc.)
Support for all IP services (TCP, UDP, IPSec, VoIP, custom protocols)

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is named a Customers' Choice
relatedBlades.subheadline: in the 2023 Gartner Peer Insights "Voice of the Customer": DDoS Mitigation Solutions.

features.title: 24/7/365 multi channel support (phone, chat, email)
features.description: Phone, chat, and email 24/7/365 support with median response time of 15 minutes.

features.title: 100% uptime guarantee with 25x reimbursement SLA
features.description: In the rare event of downtime, Enterprise customers receive a 25x credit against the monthly fee, in proportion to the respective disruption and affected customer ratio.

features.title: Predictable flat-rate pricing for usage based products
features.description: Only enterprise customers can negotiate flat rate pricing on Argo, Rate limiting, Workers, Load Balancing, Live Stream and more.

features.title: Advanced controls and management options
features.description: Enterprise customers have lower TTLs and can purge cache by tag or host.

features.title: Advanced logging and analytics
features.description: Use the power of Cloudflare's network to intelligently manage bot traffic to your application in order to prevent credential stuffing, inventory hoarding, content scraping and other types of fraud.

features.title: Access to raw logs
features.description: Take charge of your data and run your own analytics using raw log data from web assets on Cloudflare's network.

features.title: Firewall analytics
features.description: Understand the impact of your WAF configuration. Firewall Analytics let you know if a rule is effective by illustrating the impact in an easy to digest format.

features.title: Role based access
features.description: Provide role-based access throughout your organization. Each user is given set permissions, individual API keys, and optional two-factor authentication.

features.title: Network prioritization
features.description: Enterprise web assets are placed on Cloudflare dedicated IP ranges, providing prioritized routing and protection to ensure maximum speed and availability.
